subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Marc Gasol had 15 points and 14 rebounds, Rudy Gay scored 14 points and the host Memphis Grizzlies beat the Philadelphia 76ers, 89-76.
snippet: Marc Gasol had 15 points and 14 rebounds, Rudy Gay scored 14 points and the host Memphis Grizzlies beat the Philadelphia 76ers, 89-76.
